content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_block
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 64, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 26, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 10, "index": 37}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 55, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft an iron_block, I need to place 9 iron ingots in a 3x3 grid in the crafting table. I will start by moving one of the iron ingots from slot 28 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_block
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 64, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 26, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 10, "index": 37}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 55, "index": 38}]
thought: To continue crafting the iron_block, I will move another iron ingot to the crafting table, placing it in slot 2 (to the right of the previous iron ingot).
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1
